analysis.key_quote: I believe that this proposed change will not effectively represent the best long term interests of our country as we would be instead in a system which is beholding to the short term interest of current political interests, whatever they may be at any given time.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the potential negative impact on the long-term interests of the country, indicating a preference for a stable, merit-based system.
